original_text: You must surely know what is true! You must have heard about it. The Lord is the God who lives for ever. He made the whole earth, near and far. He never becomes tired or weak. He knows and he understands everything. You must surely know what is true! You must have heard about it. The Lord is the God who lives for ever. He made the whole earth, near and far. He never becomes tired or weak. He knows and he understands everything. You must surely know what is true! You must have heard about it. The Lord is the God who lives for ever. He made the whole earth, near and far. He never becomes tired or weak. He knows and he understands everything. You must surely know what is true! You must have heard about it. The Lord is the God who lives for ever. He made the whole earth, near and far. He never becomes tired or weak. He knows and he understands everything. You must surely know what is true!
korean_text: 너는 알지 못하였느냐 듣지 못하였느냐 영원하신 하나님 여호와, 땅 끝까지 창조하신 이는 피곤하지 않으시며 곤비하지 않으시며 명철이 한이 없으시며

sentences.original_text: You must surely know what is true!
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 진리가 무엇인지 반드시 알아야 합니다!

sentences.original_text: You must have heard about it.
The Lord is the God who lives for ever.
He made the whole earth, near and far.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 가까운 곳과 먼 곳의 온 땅을 만드셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He never becomes tired or weak.
He knows and he understands everything.
You must surely know what is true!
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 진리가 무엇인지 반드시 알아야 합니다!
